Production_Ramp.trend: Companies scaling from pilots to production (100s → 1000s of units)
Production_Ramp.evidence_needed: Actual production numbers vs. announced capacity
Production_Ramp.bullish_signal: Multiple companies hit 1000+ units deployed by end 2025

Enterprise_Adoption.trend: Moving from pilots to full deployments
Enterprise_Adoption.evidence_needed: Pilot → production transition, ROI data, contract expansions
Enterprise_Adoption.bullish_signal: Multiple companies announce multi-year enterprise contracts
Enterprise_Adoption.bearish_signal: Pilots end without expansion, ROI concerns cited

China_Dominance.trend: Chinese companies (Unitree, UBTech) scaling faster than Western competitors
China_Dominance.evidence_needed: Production numbers, market share in China, export volumes
China_Dominance.bullish_signal: China domestic market hits 50K+ units/year by 2026
China_Dominance.bearish_signal: Quality concerns, export restrictions limit growth

Geopolitical_Tensions.trend: US-China decoupling in robotics (export controls, tariffs)
Geopolitical_Tensions.evidence_needed: New export controls, tariffs, REE restrictions
Geopolitical_Tensions.bullish_signal: Stable trade environment, no new restrictions
Geopolitical_Tensions.bearish_signal: Escalating tech war, REE export quotas, tariffs

AI_Integration.trend: OpenAI + others partnering with robotics companies for embodied AI
AI_Integration.evidence_needed: Demonstrations of AI capabilities, autonomous task completion
AI_Integration.bullish_signal: Robots achieve human-level task performance in demos
AI_Integration.bearish_signal: AI integration underwhelms, teleoperation still needed

Funding_Environment.trend: VC funding for robotics (abundant or drying up?)
Funding_Environment.evidence_needed: New funding rounds, valuations, IPO success
Funding_Environment.bullish_signal: Large Series B/C rounds at rising valuations, successful IPOs
Funding_Environment.bearish_signal: Down rounds, funding gaps, delayed IPOs

Company_Updates: Check each company's blog/news page for Q3-Q4 2025 updates
Search Google News for '[Company Name] humanoid robot' (past 6 months)
Check TechCrunch, The Robot Report, IEEE Spectrum for coverage
Review investor update letters (if available for private companies)
Government_Policy: Search for China MIIT robotics announcements (2025)
Check US Commerce Dept export control updates
Research IRA/CHIPS Act funding for robotics companies
Monitor EU AI Act implications for humanoid robots
Market_Data: Verify UBTech stock price (9888.HK) and any investor presentations
Check if Tesla disclosed Optimus production numbers in Q3 earnings
Research any new funding rounds on Crunchbase
Look for industry reports from Gartner, IDC, ABI Research

note: This data requires manual research and validation
